src:
首相、中国・李首相と会談…習主席来日に向け連携確認へ

04 Nov 2019, 03:38



日中首脳会談で中国の李克強首相（右）と握手を交わす安倍首相（４日午前、バンコクで）＝片岡航希撮影

　【バンコク＝池田慶太】安倍首相は４日、バンコクで開かれている東南アジア諸国連合（ＡＳＥＡＮ）関連首脳会議の会場内で、中国の李克強（リークォーチャン）首相と個別に会談した。来年春の習近平（シージンピン）国家主席の国賓来日に向け、日中両政府の連携を確認する方向だ。
　両首相の会談は、昨年１０月に安倍首相が中国を公式訪問して以来。
　安倍首相は会談で、中国公船による尖閣諸島周辺の領海侵入事案のほか、９月に北京で拘束された北海道大学の男性教授ら日本人の拘束が相次いでいることなども取り上げ、中国に適切な対応を求めるとみられる。
text:
Prime Minister meets with Chinese Prime Minister Lee ... Confirmation of cooperation for Xi's visit to Japan

04 Nov 2019, 03:38



Prime Minister Abe shaking hands with Chinese Prime Minister Lee Keqiang (right) at a Japan-China summit meeting

[Bangkok = Keita Ikeda] Prime Minister Abe talked individually with Prime Minister Lee Quo Qiang in the venue of the ASEAN-related summit held in Bangkok on the 4th. Next year towards the state guest visit to Japan of Xi Jinping (Shijinpin) Jintao of spring, but the direction to confirm the cooperation of both the government during the day.
The meeting between the two prime ministers has been since Prime Minister Abe's official visit to China last October.
Appropriate Prime Minister Abe, in addition to the case of the intrusion of territorial waters around the Senkaku Islands by a Chinese public ship, and the fact that male professors from Hokkaido University, who were detained in Beijing in September, were one after another, are appropriate for China. It seems that it demands a proper response.
